message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm initially setting the price at $14,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $9,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $12,500.  I believe this offer represents a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
